summary: Requiem 1.8.x patch for Cloaks of Skyrim by Noodles
descriptionHtml:
Requiem 1.8.x patch for Cloaks of Skyrim by Noodles

Dragon Priests have been adjusted to match Requiem's values. Magic cloaks can no longer be disenchanted. Fixed the leveled list. Compatible with Cloaks of Skyrim Dawnguard.

[u]Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Requiem - Cloaks.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Requiem - Cloaks.esp after Requiem and Cloaks of Skyrim and before Requiem for the Indifferent.

Skyrim.esm
....
....
Cloaks.esp
....
Cloaks - Dawnguard.esp
....
Requiem.esp
....
Requiem - Cloaks.esp
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp                    <--- if you use Wrye Bash
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp


[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]: Ogerboss and Xarrian
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url]: Noodles
author: spikyfishy

files.name: Requiem - Cloaks v2
files.changelogHtml: Updated changes to dragon priests for Requiem 1.8.2
